name: Ah
description:
Ah is the first text adventure I have ever written.

It is a story about a something, struggling with stagnation of its very being.

Version #4

NOTE: To play the game with its soundtrack, download the .zip file and unpack the folder inside; open the html file inside, and as long as you don't move any files around in that folder, the  music should play!

It is also both the first and final Something story, which should soon be published in an anthology of their own.

Credits:

Written and programmed by RecDra, alias Ariadne Schimmler
Proofread by Fluffydeathbringer
Music by Decon Theed

Made in Twine 1.4.2
